trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows combo box control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 下拉式方塊控制項。

trans-unit.source: A ComboBox displays a text box combined with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, which enables the user to select items from the list or enter a new value.
trans-unit.target: 下拉式方塊會顯示文字方塊中結合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，可讓使用者從清單中選取項目，或輸入新的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> property specifies whether the list is always displayed or whether the list is displayed in a drop-down.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性會指定是否會永遠顯示清單，或是否顯示在下拉式清單中的清單。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> property also specifies whether the text portion can be edited.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性也會指定是否可編輯的文字部分。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle> for the available settings and their effects.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle>可用的設定和其效果。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle>

trans-unit.source: There is no setting to always display the list and disallow entering a new value.
trans-unit.target: 沒有要永遠顯示清單，並且不允許輸入新值的設定。

trans-unit.source: To display a list to which no new values can be added, use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示可以加入任何新的值清單，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: To add or remove objects in the list at run time, use methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A> property of the ComboBox).
trans-unit.target: 若要新增或移除清單中的物件，在執行階段，使用方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection>類別 (透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A>屬性的下拉式方塊)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can assign an array of object references with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指派的物件參考陣列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The list then displays the default string value for each object.
trans-unit.target: 然後，此清單會顯示每個物件的預設字串值。

trans-unit.source: You can add individual objects with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入具有個別物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can delete items with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or clear the entire list with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以刪除的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或清除整個清單與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Clear%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition to display and selection functionality, the ComboBox also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the ComboBox and to find text within the items of the list.
trans-unit.target: 顯示和選取的功能，除了下拉式方塊也會提供功能，可讓您有效率地將項目加入至下拉式方塊，並尋找清單的項目中的文字。

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods, you can add a large number of items to the ComboBox without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法，您可以將大量的項目加入下拉式方塊項目新增至清單每次重繪控制項沒有。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法可讓您搜尋包含特定的搜尋字串的清單中的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use these properties to manage the currently selected item in the list, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Text%2A> property to specify the string displayed in the editing field, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property to get or set the current item, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedItem%2A> property to get or set a reference to the object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些屬性來管理目前選取的項目在清單中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Text%2A>屬性來指定顯示在編輯的欄位中，字串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性來取得或設定目前的項目，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedItem%2A>屬性來取得或設定物件的參考。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, ComboBox, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> on a base Windows Forms page and want to modify the string collections of those controls in a derived form, the string collections of those controls in the base form must be empty.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，下拉式方塊，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>Windows Form 頁面和想要修改這些控制項在衍生表單中的字串集合的基底，基底表單中的這些控制項的字串集合必須是空白。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If the string collections are not empty, they become read-only when you derive another form.
trans-unit.target: 如果字串集合不是空的它們會變成唯讀時衍生另一種形式。

trans-unit.source: Maintains performance when items are added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> one at a time.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目時可維護效能<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>一次。

trans-unit.source: This method prevents the control from painting until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會讓控制項繪製直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>).
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入，最好<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection>類別 (透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您一次加入清單的項目陣列。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection> class, you can use the BeginUpdate method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection>類別，您可以使用 BeginUpdate 方法防止重繪控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>每個項目新增至清單的時間。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 完成的工作項目加入清單後，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法，以啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>重繪。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flicker during the drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入這種方式可以防止重繪閃動繪製期間<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>當正在大量項目加入至清單。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>參考。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於主控描繪的視覺外觀<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>變更。

trans-unit.source: This event is used by an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件是由主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個事件來執行在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>繪製項目所需的工作

trans-unit.source: If you have a variable sized item (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to the `OwnerDrawVariable` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>), before drawing an item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有變數的大小項目 (當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設定為`OwnerDrawVariable`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>)，繪製項目之前,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem> event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the DrawItem event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem>事件，以指定您所要繪製在 DrawItem 事件的事件處理常式項目的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出您的程式碼或作業系統是否將會處理清單中項目的繪圖。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 值不是有效<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.target: 發生時的下拉式部分<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>所示。

trans-unit.target: 發生時的下拉式部分<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>不再顯示。

trans-unit.source: Use the DropDownClosed event to restore the state of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> from changes you made in response to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDown> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要還原的狀態使用 DropDownClosed 事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>回應中所做的變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDown>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height in pixels of the drop-down portion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定像素為單位的下拉式部分的高度<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Setting the DropDownHeight property resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.IntegralHeight%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 設定 DropDownHeight 屬性重設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.IntegralHeight%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.IntegralHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the drop-down box.
trans-unit.target: 高度 （像素為單位的下拉式清單方塊）。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than one.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值是小於&1;。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the style of the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定下拉式方塊的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The DropDownStyle property specifies whether the list is always displayed or whether the list is displayed in a drop-down.
trans-unit.target: DropDownStyle 屬性會指定是否永遠顯示清單，或是否顯示在下拉式清單中的清單。

trans-unit.source: The DropDownStyle property also specifies whether the text portion can be edited.
trans-unit.target: DropDownStyle 屬性也會指定是否可編輯的文字部分。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle> for the available settings and their effects.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle>可用的設定和其效果。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle>

trans-unit.source: There is no setting to always display the list and disallow entering a new value.
trans-unit.target: 沒有要永遠顯示清單，並且不允許輸入新值的設定。

trans-unit.source: To display a list to which no new values can be added, use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示可以加入任何新的值清單，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_DropDown" name="DropDown" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_DropDown" name="DropDown" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle*>屬性已變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the of the drop-down portion of a combo box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定寬度的下拉式方塊的下拉式部分。

trans-unit.source: If a value has not been set for the DropDownWidth, this property returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> of the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 如果值尚未設定為 DropDownWidth，則這個屬性會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>下拉式方塊。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The width of the drop-down cannot be smaller than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> width.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 的下拉式清單寬度不能小於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>寬度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the drop-down box.
trans-unit.target: 寬度 （像素為單位的下拉式清單方塊）。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than one.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值是小於&1;。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the combo box is displaying its drop-down portion.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出下拉式方塊是否正顯示它的下拉式部分。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the drop-down portion is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果顯示下拉部分。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is false.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 false。

trans-unit.source: Resumes painting the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> control after painting is suspended by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate*> method.
trans-unit.target: 繼續繪製<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>控制暫停繪製之後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>).
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入，最好<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection>類別 (透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您一次加入清單的項目陣列。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection>類別，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以防止重繪控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>每個項目新增至清單的時間。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the EndUpdate method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 完成的工作項目加入清單後，請呼叫 EndUpdate 方法，以啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>重繪。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目可以防止這種 flickered 繪圖的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>當正在大量項目加入至清單。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> that starts with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回索引中的第一個項目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>以指定字串開頭。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數是要比較的下拉式方塊的清單中的項目相關聯的文字子字串。

trans-unit.source: The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text, and returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋執行進行局部比對從文字的開頭開始，並傳回第一個項目在清單中符合指定的子字串。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行的工作，例如移除包含搜尋文字使用的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或變更項目的文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, you must use the version of the FindString method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦找到指定的文字，如果您想要搜尋的文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>，您必須使用所提供的參數來指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>內的起始索引 FindString 方法的版本</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>中的其他執行個體

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行精確的字詞相符而不是在部分符合的搜尋，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to search for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>要搜尋</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns -1 if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到的第一個項目以零為起始的索引如果沒有找到符合的則傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> beyond the specified index that contains the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回索引中的第一個項目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>超出指定的索引，其中包含指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: The search is not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數是要比較的下拉式方塊的清單中的項目相關聯的文字子字串。

trans-unit.source: The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text, returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會執行部分相符的文字，從頭開始在清單中符合指定的子字串中傳回第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行的工作，例如移除包含搜尋文字使用的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或變更項目的文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫使用這個方法不會指定起始索引版本之後，通常使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text.
trans-unit.target: 一旦在清單中找到的初始項目，這個方法通常用來進一步搜尋文字的執行個體指定尋找中的索引位置`startIndex`參數搜尋文字的第一個找到的執行個體後的項目。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行精確的字詞相符而不是在部分符合的搜尋，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to search for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>要搜尋</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item before the first item to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的第一個項目之前，項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Set to -1 to search from the beginning of the control.
trans-unit.target: 從控制項的開頭進行搜尋，請設定為-1。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns -1 if no match is found, or 0 if the s parameter specifies .
trans-unit.target: 找到的第一個項目以零為起始的索引會傳回-1，如果找到相符項目或 0 s 參數會指定.

trans-unit.source: The startIndex is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: startIndex 小於-1。

trans-unit.source: -or- The startIndex is greater than the last index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: -或- startIndex 大於集合中的最後一個索引。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the combo box that matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 尋找符合指定之字串的下拉式方塊中的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is a string to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數是要針對下拉式方塊的清單中的項目相關聯的文字進行比較的字串。

trans-unit.source: The search looks for a match starting from the beginning of the text, returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會尋找相符項目從文字的開頭開始傳回符合指定的子字串的清單中的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行的工作，例如移除包含搜尋文字使用的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或變更項目的文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, you must use the version of the FindStringExact method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦找到指定的文字，如果您想要搜尋的文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>，您必須使用所提供的參數來指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>內的起始索引 FindStringExact 方法的版本</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>中的其他執行個體

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform partial word search instead of an exact word match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行部分文字搜尋，而不是正確的字相符項目，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to search for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>要搜尋</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns -1 if no match is found, or 0 if the s parameter specifies .
trans-unit.target: 找到的第一個項目以零為起始的索引會傳回-1，如果找到相符項目或 0 s 參數會指定.

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item after the specified index that matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 尋找符合指定之字串的指定索引之後的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is a string to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數是要針對下拉式方塊的清單中的項目相關聯的文字進行比較的字串。

trans-unit.source: The search looks for a match starting from the beginning of the text, returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會尋找相符項目從文字的開頭開始傳回符合指定的子字串的清單中的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行的工作，例如移除包含搜尋文字使用的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或變更項目的文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫使用這個方法不會指定起始索引版本之後，通常使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text.
trans-unit.target: 一旦在清單中找到的初始項目，這個方法通常用來進一步搜尋文字的執行個體指定尋找中的索引位置`startIndex`參數搜尋文字的第一個找到的執行個體後的項目。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform partial word search instead of an exact word match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行部分文字搜尋，而不是正確的字相符項目，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.FindString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is circular.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行之搜尋是循環。

trans-unit.source: Although the search starts at the next index after the `startIndex` parameter, the search restarts at 0 when the end of the collection is reached.
trans-unit.target: 雖然搜尋開始執行之後的下一個索引`startIndex`參數，從 0 重新到達集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: However, note that if the `startIndex` parameter itself is equal to the last index in the collection, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 不過，請注意，如果`startIndex`參數本身是等於集合中最後一個索引，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to search for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>要搜尋</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item before the first item to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的第一個項目之前，項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Set to -1 to search from the beginning of the control.
trans-unit.target: 從控制項的開頭進行搜尋，請設定為-1。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns -1 if no match is found, or 0 if the s parameter specifies .
trans-unit.target: 找到的第一個項目以零為起始的索引會傳回-1，如果找到相符項目或 0 s 參數會指定.

trans-unit.source: The startIndex is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: startIndex 小於-1。

trans-unit.source: -or- The startIndex is equal to the last index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: -或- startIndex 等於集合中最後一個索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the appearance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的外觀<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, if the FlatStyle property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>, the drop-down arrow may be resized.
trans-unit.target: 如果 FlatStyle 屬性設定為從.NET Framework 4.5.2<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>，可能會調整大小的下拉式箭號。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: 調整大小取決於系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目︰``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The options are <xref uid="langword_csharp_Flat" name="Flat" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Popup" name="Popup" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Standard" name="Standard" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_System" name="System" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The options are <xref uid="langword_csharp_Flat" name="Flat" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Popup" name="Popup" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Standard" name="Standard" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_System" name="System" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Standard" name="Standard" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Standard" name="Standard" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> has focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>具有焦點。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this control has focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個控制項沒有焦點，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the height of an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回中的項目高度<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A> is not set to `OwnerDrawVariable`, the value of the `index` parameter is ignored because all items in a standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> are the same size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A>未設定為`OwnerDrawVariable`，值`index`參數會被忽略，因為在標準的所有項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>大小都一樣。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property when you are using an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> to determine the size of any item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，當您使用主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>判斷<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>內的任何項目的大小</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying the height for items in an owner-drawn list, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 多個指定的項目高度主控描繪清單中的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to return the height of.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回其高度的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 高度 （像素為單位的指定索引處的項目）。

trans-unit.source: The index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or- The index is greater than count of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: -或- index 大於清單中的項目計數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should resize to avoid showing partial items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否應該重新調整大小以避免僅顯示部分項目。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the control automatically resizes to ensure that an item is not partially displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，控制項會自動調整大小以確保不部分顯示項目。

trans-unit.source: If you want to maintain the original size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> based on the space requirements of your form, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要維護的原始大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>根據表單的空間需求，將此屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> does not contain any items, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>不包含任何項目，這個屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A> property resets the IntegralHeight property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A>屬性重設 IntegralHeight 屬性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `OwnerDrawVariable`, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為`OwnerDrawVariable`，此屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list portion can contain only complete items; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果清單部分只能包含僅完整項目，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的按鍵是標準輸入的按鍵或需要前置處理的特殊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: The IsInputKey method returns `true` when the `keyData` parameter includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DroppedDown%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: IsInputKey 方法會傳回`true`時`keyData`參數包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DroppedDown%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DroppedDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的按鍵是標準輸入的按鍵。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of an item in the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定下拉式方塊中的項目高度。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `OwnerDrawFixed`, all items have the same height.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為`OwnerDrawFixed`，所有項目具有相同的高度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode> property is set to `OwnerDrawVariable`, the ItemHeight property specifies the height of each item added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode>屬性設定為`OwnerDrawVariable`，ItemHeight 屬性指定的每個項目加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>高度</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode>

trans-unit.source: Because each item in an owner-drawn list can have a different height, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.GetItemHeight%2A> method to get the height of a specific item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 由於在主控描繪清單中的每個項目可以有不同的高度，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.GetItemHeight%2A>方法來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>中特定項目的高度</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.GetItemHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you use the ItemHeight property on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> with items of variable height, this property returns the height of the first item in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 ItemHeight 屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>可變高度的項目，這個屬性會傳回第一個項目的高度控制項中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying the height for items in an owner-drawn list, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 多個指定的項目高度主控描繪清單中的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.MeasureItem>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of an item in the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 高度 （像素為單位的下拉式方塊中的項目）。

trans-unit.source: The item height value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 項目高度值小於零。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object representing the collection of the items contained in this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，表示集合中包含的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性可讓您取得的目前儲存在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>的項目清單的參考

trans-unit.source: With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 與這個參考中，您可以將項目加入、 移除項目，並取得集合中的項目計數。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> is typically used to display text items, you can add any object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>是通常用來顯示文字項目，您可以將任何物件加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the representation of an object in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> is the string returned by that object's <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言中的物件表示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>是該物件所傳回的字串<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to have a member of the object displayed instead, choose the member that will be displayed by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property to the name of the appropriate member.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要有改為顯示之物件的成員，選擇將顯示設定的成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>屬性設為適當的成員的名稱。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also choose a member of the object that will represent the value returned by the object by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以選擇將代表藉由設定物件所傳回的值物件的成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection?displayProperty=fullName> class reference topics.
trans-unit.target: 如需可以執行與項目集合之工作的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection?displayProperty=fullName>類別參考主題。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection?displayProperty=fullName> representing the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection?displayProperty=fullName>表示中的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items to be shown in the drop-down portion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示的下拉式部分中的項目數目上限<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items of in the drop-down portion.
trans-unit.target: 下拉式方塊部分中項目的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The minimum for this property is 1 and the maximum is 100.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的最小值為 1，而最大值為 100。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number is set less than one or greater than 100.
trans-unit.target: 最大數目是設定為小於 1 或大於 100。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size that is the upper limit that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*> method can specify.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的上限大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>方法可以指定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 類型的排序的配對<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>代表矩形的高度與寬度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of characters a user can type into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者可以輸入的字元數目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters a user can enter.
trans-unit.target: 使用者能夠輸入的字元數上限。

trans-unit.source: Values of less than zero are reset to zero, which is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 小於零的值會重設為零，也就是預設值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs each time an owner-drawn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> item needs to be drawn and when the sizes of the list items are determined.
trans-unit.target: 每當發生描繪<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>必須繪製項目和清單項目的大小所決定時。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to specify the size an item is made before it is drawn in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立指定大小的項目會繪製前的此事件的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawItem>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size that is the lower limit that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*> method can specify.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定下限的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>方法可以指定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 類型的排序的配對<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>代表矩形的高度與寬度。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawItem"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawItem"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called each time an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> item needs to be drawn and after <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.OnMeasureItem%2A> is called.

trans-unit.target: OnSelectedValueChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted> is raised only when the user changes the combo box selection, or when you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted>只有當使用者變更下拉式方塊選取項目，或是當您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>引發</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted>

trans-unit.source: However, depending on how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> is configured, and how the user changes the selected item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted> event may not be raised.
trans-unit.target: 不過，依據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>設定，以及使用者如何變更選取的項目，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted>可能不會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>, but note that this event occurs whether the index is changed programmatically or by the user.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>，但請注意，會發生此事件以程式設計方式或使用者，是否要變更索引。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: Gets the preferred height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得的慣用的高度<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The preferred height is a value based on the font height and an adjustment for the border.
trans-unit.target: 根據字型高度和框線調整值的慣用的高度。

trans-unit.source: The preferred height, in pixels, of the item area of the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 慣用的高度，單位為像素的項目區域的下拉式方塊。

trans-unit.source: Processes a key message and generates the appropriate control events.
trans-unit.target: 處理按鍵訊息，並產生適當的控制項事件。

trans-unit.source: A message object, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: 訊息物件，代表要處理的視窗訊息的參考所傳遞。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果處理訊息的控制項。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the item contained at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理包含在指定位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: The location of the item to refresh.
trans-unit.target: 要重新整理之項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes all <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> items.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理所有<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 重設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*>屬性為其預設值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: 縮放控制項的位置、 大小、 邊框距離和邊界。

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的寬度與高度會縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定在定義的大小和位置時所使用的控制項範圍。

trans-unit.source: Selects a range of text in the editable portion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 可編輯部分中選取某個範圍的文字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set the start position to the first character in the control's text, set the `start` parameter to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要設定控制項的文字中的第一個字元的開始位置，設定`start`參數為零。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to select a substring of text, such as when searching through the text of the control and replacing information.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，以選取的子字串的文字，例如當透過控制項的文字搜尋和取代的資訊。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionStart%2A> returns the lower value of the current selection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionStart%2A>傳回目前的選取範圍的較低的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `Select(10, -4)` selects the text from character position 6 through character position 10.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Select(10, -4)`選取從位置 6 到 10 的字元位置的文字。

trans-unit.source: If you now get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionStart%2A> value, it will be 6 rather than 10.
trans-unit.target: 如果您現在取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionStart%2A>值，它將是 6，而不是 10。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position of the first character in the current text selection within the text box.
trans-unit.target: 在文字方塊中目前文字選取範圍中第一個字元位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to select.
trans-unit.target: 若要選取的字元數。

trans-unit.source: The start is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: start 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or- start plus length is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: -or- start plus length is less than zero.

trans-unit.source: Selects all the text in the editable portion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 可編輯部分中選取所有文字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index specifying the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前選取的項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the zero-based index of the currently selected item in the combo box list.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會指出下拉式方塊清單中目前選取之項目的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Setting a new index raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 設定新的索引會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: SelectedIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> are related as follows: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> is `false`, SelectedIndex will not be set to -1 when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> is blank.
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndex， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>相關，如下所示:-如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>是`false`，SelectedIndex 將不會設定為-1<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>是空白。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> is `true`, SelectedIndex will be set to -1 when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> is blank.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>是`true`，SelectedIndex 將會設定為-1<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>是空白。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To deselect the currently selected item, set the SelectedIndex to -1.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 以取消選取目前選取的項目，將 SelectedIndex 設定為-1。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the SelectedIndex of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> item to -1 if the item is a data-bound item.
trans-unit.target: 您不能設定的 SelectedIndex<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>如果項目是資料繫結項目，項目設為-1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 目前選取的項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: A value of negative one (-1) is returned if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 負一 (-1) 如果會傳回任何項目已選取。

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than or equal to -2.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引小於或等於-2。

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified index is greater than or equal to the number of items in the combo box.
trans-unit.target: -或者-指定的索引必須大於或等於下拉式方塊中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex*>屬性已變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex*>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to determine when the selected index in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立此事件，以判斷何時的事件處理常式中選取的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>已變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: This can be useful when you need to display information in other controls based on the current selection in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 這有助於進行您需要根據目前的選取範圍，在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>其他控制項中顯示資訊

trans-unit.source: You can use the event handler for this event to load the information in the other controls.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此事件的事件處理常式載入其他控制項中的資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets currently selected item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前選取的項目中<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you set the SelectedItem property to an object, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> attempts to make that object the currently selected one in the list.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定 SelectedItem 屬性，此物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>嘗試使該物件清單中目前選取的一個。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If the object is found in the list, it is displayed in the edit portion of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property is set to the corresponding index.
trans-unit.target: 如果在清單中找到物件，它會顯示在編輯部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性設定為對應的索引。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If the object does not exist in the list, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property is left at its current value.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件不在清單中，存在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性留在目前的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> class searches for the specified object by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>類別搜尋指定的物件使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: This method uses the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method to determine equality.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法來判斷是否相等。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that is the currently selected item or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 目前選取的項目之物件或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有目前選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is selected in the editable portion of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所選取的可編輯部分中的文字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You can use the SelectedText property to retrieve or change the currently selected text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 SelectedText 屬性來擷取或變更目前選取的文字中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: However, you should be aware that the selection can change automatically because of user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您應該注意選取項目可以自動變更，因為使用者互動。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you retrieve the SelectedText value in a button <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler, the value will be an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您在擷取按鈕中的 SelectedText 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件處理常式，值會是空字串。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: This is because the selection is automatically cleared when the input focus moves from the combo box to the button.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為輸入的焦點從下拉式方塊移到 [] 按鈕時，就會自動清除選取項目。

trans-unit.source: When the combo box loses focus, the selection point moves to the beginning of the text and any selected text becomes unselected.
trans-unit.target: 下拉式方塊失去焦點時，當選取範圍點移至文字的開頭，並選取的文字會變成未選取。

trans-unit.source: In this case, getting the SelectedText property retrieves an empty string, and setting the SelectedText property adds the specified value to the beginning of the text.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，取得 SelectedText 屬性擷取空字串，並設定 SelectedText 屬性將指定的值加入至文字的開頭。

trans-unit.source: When the combo box gains focus, the full text in the control is automatically selected.
trans-unit.target: 當下拉式方塊取得焦點時，會自動選取控制項中的全文。

trans-unit.source: If you call the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method to set the input focus, the full text is selected regardless of whether the control already had focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>方法，以設定輸入的焦點、 全文檢索選取不論控制項是否已經具有焦點。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user selects an item from the drop-down list or by using the UP ARROW and DOWN ARROW keys, the text for the new item is automatically selected.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者選取項目，從下拉式清單或使用向上和向下鍵時，會自動選取新項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: However, if you try to get the SelectedText value in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> event handler, the property returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您嘗試取值 SelectedText<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged>事件處理常式，屬性會傳回空字串。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: This is because, at the time of these events, the previous SelectedText value has been cleared and the new value has not yet been set.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為在這些事件時，先前的 SelectedText 值已清除，而且尚未設定的新值。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the current value in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> event handler, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedItem%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取中的目前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged>事件處理常式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedItem%2A>屬性改為。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the currently selected text in the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示下拉式方塊中目前選取的文字。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle*> is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle"></xref>, the return value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle*>設<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle"> </xref>，傳回的值為空字串 ("")。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user changes the selected item and that change is displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者變更選取的項目，而且該變更會顯示在<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The SelectionChangeCommitted event is raised only when the user changes the combo box selection, and you can create a handler for this event to provide special handling for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> when the user changes the selected item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 只有當使用者變更下拉式方塊選取項目，而且您可以建立要提供特殊處理此事件處理常式時，會引發 SelectionChangeCommitted 事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>當使用者變更清單中選取的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: However, depending on how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> is configured, and how the user changes the selected item, the SelectionChangeCommitted event may not be raised.
trans-unit.target: 不過，依據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>設定，以及如何在使用者變更選取的項目，可能不會引發 SelectionChangeCommitted 事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>, but note that this event occurs whether the index is changed programmatically or by the user.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>，但請注意，會發生此事件以程式設計方式或使用者，是否要變更索引。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of characters selected in the editable portion of the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定下拉式方塊可編輯部分中選取的字元數。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether any characters are currently selected in the combo box control before performing operations on the selected text.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否任何字元中目前所選取的下拉式方塊控制項選取的文字上執行作業之前，您可以使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the SelectionLength property is set to a value that is larger than the number of characters within the text of the control, the value of the SelectionLength property is set to the entire length of text within the control minus the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionStart%2A> property (if any value is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionStart%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 當 SelectionLength 屬性的值設定為大於控制項文字內的字元數的值時，SelectionLength 屬性的值設定為完整的值減掉控制項內的文字長度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionStart%2A>屬性 (如果指定的任何值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionStart%2A>屬性)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of characters selected in the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 選取下拉式方塊中的字元數。

trans-unit.source: The value was less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 值小於零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting index of text selected in the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定下拉式方塊中選取文字的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point for new text.
trans-unit.target: 如果在控制項中不選取任何文字，則這個屬性會指出新文字的插入點。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position is placed after the last character.
trans-unit.target: 如果您為控制項中文字的長度超過設定這個屬性，在選取範圍開始位置位於最後一個字元之後。

trans-unit.source: When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property can release the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 文字方塊控制項中選取文字時，變更這個屬性可以發行的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the SelectionStart property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> property, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> property is automatically decreased.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項之後 SelectionStart 屬性所指定的位置中的其餘文字的值少於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>屬性、 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>屬性就會自動減少。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the SelectionStart property never causes an increase in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: SelectionStart 屬性的值永遠不會造成增加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > SelectionStart returns the lower value of the current selection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SelectionStart 傳回目前的選取範圍的較低的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Select(10, -4)` selects the text from character position 6 through character position 10.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Select(10, -4)`選取從位置 6 到 10 的字元位置的文字。

trans-unit.source: If you now get the SelectionStart value, it will be 6 rather than 10.
trans-unit.target: 如果您現在取得 SelectionStart 值，將為 6，而不是 10。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first character in the string of the current text selection.
trans-unit.target: 在目前文字選取範圍的字串中的第一個字元以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 值小於零。

trans-unit.source: Sets the size and location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 設定大小和位置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal location in pixels of the control.
trans-unit.target: 單位為像素控制項的水平位置。

trans-unit.source: The vertical location in pixels of the control.
trans-unit.target: 單位為像素控制項的垂直位置。

trans-unit.source: The width in pixels of the control.
trans-unit.target: 單位為像素控制項的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The height in pixels of the control.
trans-unit.target: 單位為像素控制項的高度。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, sets the object with the specified index in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，設定具有指定索引的物件，衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: The array index of the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的陣列索引。

trans-unit.source: The object.
trans-unit.target: 物件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, sets the specified array of objects in a collection in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，設定指定之物件的陣列中在衍生類別中的集合。

trans-unit.source: An array of items.
trans-unit.target: 陣列的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the combo box are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否排序下拉式方塊中的項目。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> sorts existing entries and add new entries to the appropriate sorted position in the list.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>排序與現有項目，並新增到適當的排序位置清單中的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to automatically sort items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，來自動排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>中的項目

trans-unit.source: As items are added to a sorted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, the items are moved to the appropriate location in the sorted list.
trans-unit.target: 當項目新增至排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>，項目會移至已排序的清單中的適當位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: When you set the property to `false`, new items are added to the end of the existing list.
trans-unit.target: 當您將屬性設定為`false`，新的項目加入現有清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The sort is case-insensitive and in alphabetically ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 不區分大小寫，而依字母順序遞增順序排序。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set the Sorted property on a data-bound control raises an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試在資料繫結控制項上設定排序屬性引發<xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: You must sort the data using the underlying data model.
trans-unit.target: 您必須排序的資料，使用基礎資料模型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the combo box is sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果下拉式方塊已排序。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to sort a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> that is attached to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將排序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>附加至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與這個控制項相關聯的文字。

trans-unit.source: Setting the Text property to `null` or an empty string ("") sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> to -1.
trans-unit.target: 文字屬性設定為`null`或空字串 ("") 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>為-1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the Text property to a value that is in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A> collection sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> to the index of that item.
trans-unit.target: 設定文字屬性的值位於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A>收集組<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>至該項目的索引。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the Text property to a value that is not in the collection leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 設定文字屬性的值不是在集合分葉<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>不變。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 與這個控制項相關聯的文字。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control has formatted the text, but before the text is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項已格式化文字，但顯示文字之前。

trans-unit.source: Use the TextUpdate event to validate the text before it is actually shown.
trans-unit.target: 使用 TextUpdate 事件來驗證實際顯示之前的文字。

trans-unit.source: TextUpdate is not fired if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Text%2A> property is programmatically changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果不會引發 TextUpdate<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Text%2A>屬性以程式設計方式變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，代表<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>代表目前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The string includes the type and the number of items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 字串包含的類型和中的項目數<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 處理 Windows 訊息。

trans-unit.source: All messages are sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method after getting filtered through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 所有訊息都會都傳送至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>方法之後被篩透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>方法完全對應於 Windows`WindowProc`函式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何處理 Windows 訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱`WindowProc`函式在 Windows 平台 SDK 參考的文件位於 MSDN library http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>至處理序。
